item.title: Slides for - Astoria Tech Meetup #35
item.description:
Special thanks to our presenters ⁠James Quigley, Rodney Aiglstorfer for sharing their knowledge with us.

  • ⁠James Quigley - Kubernetes - As Fast As Possible - slides
  • Rodney Aiglstorfer - Building Apps for Vision Pro: An introduction to the concepts behind spatial computing - slides
